questions.question: According to news reports, how long did Iran's Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei rule before his death?
questions.source_headline: Iran's Ayatollah Ali Khamenei is killed in Israeli strike, ending 36-year iron rule
questions.explanation: The headline states that Khamenei's death ended his 36-year iron rule

questions.question: True or False: A tram accident in Milan, Italy resulted in deaths and injuries.
questions.source_headline: Tram derails in Milan, leaving two dead and dozens injured
questions.explanation: The headline confirms a tram derailment in Milan caused two deaths and dozens of injuries

questions.question: Which country became the first in South-east Asia to have an AI law take effect?
questions.source_headline: Vietnam AI law takes effect, first in South-east Asia
questions.explanation: The headline specifically states Vietnam's AI law took effect and was first in South-east Asia

questions.question: True or False: Wall Street banks are preparing to sell billions of dollars worth of X loans.
questions.source_headline: Wall Street Banks Prepare to Sell Billions of Dollars of X Loans
questions.explanation: The headline directly states that Wall Street banks are preparing to sell billions in X loans

questions.question: How much money is Canada providing to Canada Post to prevent it from going bankrupt?
questions.source_headline: Canada to Provide $720 Million to Canada Post to Avoid Insolvency at Mail Service
questions.explanation: The headline states Canada will provide $720 million to prevent Canada Post's insolvency

questions.question: True or False: At least 55 people from Ghana have been killed in the Russia-Ukraine war.
questions.source_headline: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
questions.explanation: The headline reports that a minister confirmed at least 55 Ghanaians were killed in the Russia-Ukraine conflict

questions.question: In which South American country did a military plane carrying banknotes crash?
questions.source_headline: At least 20 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
questions.explanation: The headline specifically mentions the plane crash occurred in Bolivia

questions.question: True or False: Indonesia's government is facing criticism over importing $2.4 billion worth of trucks from India.
questions.source_headline: 'Killing auto industry': Indonesia government faces pushback on US$2.4 billion Indian trucks import
questions.explanation: The headline shows Indonesia is receiving pushback for the large Indian truck import deal

questions.question: According to reports, how many fighter jets did Israel use in its strike against Iran?
questions.source_headline: Israel attacks Iran: IDF executes 'largest-ever' strike sortie with 200 fighter jets
questions.explanation: The headline states Israel used 200 fighter jets in what's described as their largest-ever strike sortie

questions.question: True or False: A man confessed to killing a 7-year-old after DNA evidence linked him to a 30-year-old cold case.
questions.source_headline: Man confesses to killing 7-year-old while on the lam after DNA links him to 30-year cold case: authorities
questions.explanation: The headline confirms a man confessed to the murder after DNA evidence connected him to the decades-old case
